```py
def move(x, y, z):
    global xyztxt
    xyztxt = '{:5.3f} {:5.3f} {:5.3f}'.format(x,y,z)
```

```py
def flick(start,finish):
    global flicktxt
    flicktxt = 'FLICK-' + start[0].upper() + finish[0].upper()
    message(flicktxt)
```

```py

else:
            flicktxt = ''
            flickcount = 0
```
